files.description: Narendra treated Neeti Mohan's entourage to exquisite cuisine during their stay at Ananda in the Himalayas.
A picture with Bipasha Basu & Karan Singh Grover
Narendra served as a personal chef butler for King Charles, preparing exquisite meals fit for royalty
A picture with acclaimed singer Mr. Mahadevan
Narendra has showcased his culinary skills in various settings, preparing meals fit for dignitaries like Mr. Tata
Narendra crafted a delightful detox experience for Oprah Winfrey
Sonu Nigam savored Narendra's delightful Ayurvedic culinary creations.
Anushka Sharma praised Narendra for his exceptional culinary skills.
